phrases: Surely you do not have to hammer it that hard.
It did not really need to be fixed in the first place.
I just thought, this way, it will never fall off again.
Are you already packed and ready to go home?
That is all you are taking?
I will be back again soon.
I do not want to give up.
My feelings have become much stronger than they were before.
My desire to become a voice actress.
Do not mind if I do...
I am sure you are thinking...
that you have been getting by on your own these last two years.
Thinking your own thoughts, making your own decisions...
If you think that makes you an adult,
you could not be more wrong.
That is something you do if you are a kid who cannot be bothered...
When my father opposed my decision,
I think I chose the easy way out.
I just threw a tantrum because I did not get my way, and ran out.
I am going to go home and talk to them.
I will ask them to let me pursue my dream.
I will ask them to let me stay in Sakura Hall.
I will tell you one thing.
Your last two years were not a waste.
Despite how she acts, she does sound like a teacher sometimes.
If you invite me to your wedding, I will come running.
You are an infuriating brat to the very end.
As a former resident of Sakura Hall,
I came to see off my successors.
I figured I would come fill the hole in your heart.
Do you want to go for drinks?
I do not know when we will meet again.
Ryunosuke, please do not forget about me.
How am I supposed to forget you when you are constantly coming to Japan?
Well, Ryunosuke, it is time for our touching farewell.
You are doing something inappropriate again!
What is so inappropriate about a handshake?
You are as gullible as ever.
I cannot stand being away from you, after all.
I feel anxious when you are not around.
That is not what I mean.
I just wish I had something more certain.
In that case, I will take a page out of Rita-san's book.
If that is still not enough, I will leave you this.
Once I get back from Osaka, let us go submit it together.
We will be waiting for you.
I guess we do not have enough people.
The van feels kind of empty.
I am going to Suimei University, so we will see each other soon.
For now, I have got to go home and prepare for the move.
Take care of Sakura Hall for me!
Can you make a game by yourself?
I should make something just because I want to.
Even someone like me could start working on something by myself, right?
you are limited in what you can produce.
You could use a free game engine.
That is all I need to know.
Since I made it through my presentation,
I feel like a door has opened.
But I learned that there is...
an unbelievably large world waiting on the other side.
It may be frightening, but I have to start walking...
But I thought you did all your work through email.
Once in a blue moon, I have work to do outside my room, as well.
It is just the two of us now.
It is already been a year, huh?
You could use one, right, Aoyama-san?
It is been a while since I last saw my father.
I think you have made the right decision.
There is no need for us to give up.
The first night I moved into Sakura Hall,
I looked in each of the empty rooms...
for all of Sakura Hall's rooms to be filled,
and for days full of warm light and laughter to follow.
I wanted to hang it up.
Hikari would never let you hold her.
They were kissing all over the place earlier.
Oh, you mean Senpai and the others.
You make them sound like perverts.
I want to try kissing, too.
Is it... necessary for the manga you are drawing?
I have not decided yet, but probably.
Um, I would appreciate it if you would close your eyes.
It is interesting because there is something to look forward to.
Our futures will go on for a long, long time.
30th Suimei University High School of the Arts Entrance Ceremony
The regular dorms have shared rooms.
I cannot sleep in the presence of others.
Besides, my roommate made a real racket.
Well, I need to take care of the procedures to move in.
Kamakura Wada Public High School Graduate
Ah, so you are the girl.
This is the highest-scoring freshman, Hase Kanna-san.
And this is the student exiled from the regular dorms...
for sneaking a peek in the girls' bathroom, Himemiya Iori-kun.
Your sister would cry if she knew her younger brother had become...
a criminal immediately after starting school.
Do not spread such scandalous rumors about me.
I did not actually see anything.
I do not know if you will be able to have a normal high school life,
I brought you this from Osaka!
We can turn half of this into tuna cutlets.
When I said I was throwing a party for the new students,
the fishmonger gave it to me for free.
We can make hotpot with the head.
Just like they did for us.
You are really acting like an upperclassman.
Why do not you go unpack your luggage?
Kanda: Mashiro Duty Shiina Akasaka Aoyama
It is great your dad accepted your decision.
I am not sure he accepted it.
I kind of forced it on him.
But I think he realized I was serious about this.
Not going home for two years really made an impression.
I plan to work part-time again this year and save up money...
so I can attend a different training school.
So, we will get to work hard together again.
Is this your new pitch proposal?
By the way, Aoyama, could you help me out with it later?
It is a horror adventure game...
that takes place in a Western-style house.
I am hoping to make a prototype for the title screening.
Could you do some voices for...
You are assuming that your presentation will be successful.
Maybe I am getting ahead of myself.
It is good that you are more confident.
Why are you standing so far away from me?
I do not want to be near a pervert.
I told you, that was not...
Give me your fresh, dripping blood!
And a pigsty of a room.
I am Himemiya Iori, and I am going to be living here starting
If that is what you want, I am more than happy to oblige!
What do you think you are doing, you
It is not what it looks like!
A painting of the new people.
You are going to add the new students to this painting?
The skeletal structures of men are varied and difficult to paint.
Why do I have to cut the grass, anyway?
the new students into the nicest possible environment?
She is still in her room.
Why are you here all of a sudden?
I was even at the Suimei High entrance ceremony.
Until yesterday, I was Kanna-chan's roommate.
I wanted to surprise you, so I asked Mom and Dad not to tell you.
Do you remember my exam number?
It was a fake number meant to deceive you!
If you tell me it was actually 66, I am cutting ties with you.
I knew you could do it, Bro.
I refuse to acknowledge we are related by blood!
In such a short amount of time...
Yuko, what are you doing here?
Make me a member of Sakura Hall.
There is no space to paint Yuko.
Yuko, we are going to talk about this later.
I came over to pay my respects.
I am the newlywed who moved in next door, Mitaka Misaki!
I could not wait until Jin graduated,
so I submitted the marriage registration.
You can save the moving soba for later!
What was that graduation ceremony speech about?
Hall still has a variety of colors.
Colors from before, as well as new colors.
our own color shining brightly on the canvas of Sakura Hall.
I am going to leave this place!
I have not decided what I want to do in the future,
but for now, I guess I am iridescent.
I will take off your underwear.
He will send you a virus, !
Kouhai-kun, you are on Mashiro Duty!
is that it unconsciously wraps up and destroys...
Your scripts do not excite me!
I will catch up to you someday!
I think I wanted you to prove hard work is rewarded.
I want to work hard with you, too.
I am telling you not to work so hard.
I love people who have goals!
I love people who work as hard as they can!
It is not easy for me to tell Misaki how I feel about her!
Your heart is pounding because you are alive.
I am starting to have fun.
I do not know what this feeling is.
Are your precious friendships so fragile...
that you would lose them just because a building is torn down?
I told you, they are not!
I have to be prepared to be with her forever!
Why am I not good enough?
How far do you think we can go?
That is how I feel, living at Sakura Hall.
What color do you want to be?
